definition: root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: ObjectiveInspecting the best soaking time for cutting paeonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選白芍切片的最佳浸泡時間。

sentences.english: Consider to make clear, the root of herbaceous peony and root of herbaceous peony contain peony glucoside and have spasmolysis contraction effect.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，赤芍和白芍都含有芍藥甙而有解痙攣作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish an optimal extract method of paeoniflorin from Radix Paeoniae Alba with ethanol.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立白芍中芍藥苷的最佳醇提工藝。

sentences.english: AIM To study the effect of Beishao Jieyu Granules in depression mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白芍解鬱顆粒對小鼠抑鬱模型的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents in roots of Paeonia lactiflora.
sentences.chinese: 目的對白芍進行化學成分研究。

definition: the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
